com.conceptwave.scripting
Class CIL

com.conceptwave.scripting.Object
  com.conceptwave.scripting.CWScriptable
      com.conceptwave.scripting.CIL

public class CIL
extends CWScriptable

static CIL object to put and get metadata object to a storage through cilInterface var customer=CIL.get("customer/12");

Method Summary

          Delete Data Object(s) or on CIL Server based on address provided, delete ( "addr/1"); delete("addr/*)

Method Detail

delete

public static void delete(String address)
Delete Data Object(s) or on CIL Server based on address provided, delete ( "addr/1"); delete("addr/*)

Parameters:
address - The address to delete the dataobjects

get

public static com.conceptwave.scripting.Object get(String address,
                                                   String metaName)
get Array of CilDataSet stored under the specific address

Parameters:
address -
metadataName - Optional, for backward compatibility only, the metadata object name or dynamic document definition name to decode blob(s), if mixed type of data object are saved in the address, DO NOT specify it.
Returns:
array of CilDataset
Throws:
CwfException

getAddressList

public static com.conceptwave.scripting.Object getAddressList(String addressPattern)
Get a list of addresses matching addresses pattern. For example, /customer/123/agreement/* Will return address list for all agreements for customer 123.

Parameters:
addressPattern -
Returns:
Array of String

put

public static void put(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object para1,
                       com.conceptwave.scripting.Object para2)
Save DataObject through Cil Interface . there are three ways to call 1) put ( CwfCilDataSet[] ) Save all objects in the array 2) put ( CwfCilDataSet ) Save one data object 3) put ( "address/1/", obj) Save one data object to the specific address

Parameters:
para1 -
para2 -
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

setInterface

public static void setInterface(String interfaceName,
                                String[] params)
Parameters:
interfaceName - Valid option is "FileBackend" and "HttpCilInterface"
params - String Array of additional parameters to initialize CilInterface FileBackend interface : params[0] optional, it indicates the file system path for CIL interface to use, should always in unix format HttpCilInterface : params[] list of HttpCilInterface lookup service?s URL like: [?http://localhost:8184/rest/?, ?http://server.se:9880/rest/?]
Throws:
CwfException

setSchemaPath

public static void setSchemaPath(String path)
Parameters:
path - set the avro schema files location. The default location is metadata/resources
